Settings.QueryText: SELECT CatalogPeripherals.Ref AS Peripherals, CatalogPeripherals.InfobaseNode.ExportDate AS ExportDate, CatalogPeripherals.InfobaseNode.ImportDate AS ImportDate, CatalogPeripherals.InfobaseNode.ExportCompleted AS ExportCompleted, CatalogPeripherals.InfobaseNode.ImportCompleted AS ImportCompleted, CASE WHEN CatalogPeripherals.InfobaseNode.ExportCompleted THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN CatalogPeripherals.InfobaseNode.ExportDate > DATETIME(1, 1, 1) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END END AS ExportingPictureIndex, CatalogPeripherals.ExchangeRule AS ExchangeRule, CashRegisters.Ref AS CashCR, CASE WHEN 1 In (SELECT 1 AS Field1 FROM InformationRegister.ProductsCodesPeripheralOffline.Changes AS ProductCodes WHERE ProductCodes.ExchangeRule = CatalogPeripherals.ExchangeRule AND ProductCodes.Node = CatalogPeripherals.InfobaseNode) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS Changes, CatalogPeripherals.ExchangeRule.StructuralUnit AS Warehouse, CASE WHEN CatalogPeripherals.Workplace = &CurrentWorksPlace THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS ConnectedToCurrentWorksplace FROM Catalog.Peripherals AS CatalogPeripherals INNER JOIN Catalog.CashRegisters AS CashRegisters ON (CashRegisters.Peripherals = CatalogPeripherals.Ref) WHERE CatalogPeripherals.EquipmentType = VALUE(Enum.PeripheralTypes.CashRegistersOffline) AND CatalogPeripherals.DeviceIsInUse

SELECT CatalogPeripherals.Ref AS Peripherals, CatalogPeripherals.InfobaseNode.ExportDate AS ExportDate, CatalogPeripherals.InfobaseNode.ExportCompleted AS ExportCompleted, CASE WHEN CatalogPeripherals.InfobaseNode.ExportCompleted THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN CatalogPeripherals.InfobaseNode.ExportDate > DATETIME(1, 1, 1) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END END AS ExportingPictureIndex, CatalogPeripherals.ExchangeRule AS ExchangeRule, CatalogPeripherals.ExchangeRule.StructuralUnit AS Warehouse, CASE WHEN 1 In (SELECT 1 AS Field1 FROM InformationRegister.ProductsCodesPeripheralOffline.Changes AS ProductCodes WHERE ProductCodes.ExchangeRule = CatalogPeripherals.ExchangeRule AND ProductCodes.Node = CatalogPeripherals.InfobaseNode) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS Changes, CASE WHEN CatalogPeripherals.Workplace = &CurrentWorksPlace THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS ConnectedToCurrentWorksplace FROM Catalog.Peripherals AS CatalogPeripherals WHERE CatalogPeripherals.EquipmentType = VALUE(Enum.PeripheralTypes.LabelsPrintingScales) AND CatalogPeripherals.DeviceIsInUse

v8:item.v8:content: Clear the goods list in the CR and export the full list of goods
Очистить список товаров в ККМ и выгрузить полный список товаров
Clear the list of items in CR
View the items list to be exported in CR
Посмотреть список товаров к выгрузке на ККМ
Assign the rule for the selected
Assign the export rule for selected devices
Назначить правило выгрузки для выделенных устройств
Clear the list of items in the scales and export the full items list
Очистить список товаров в весах и выгрузить полный список товаров
Clear the product list in the scales
Assign the rule for the selected
Assign the rule for the selected
